articles.title: Gateway of India celebrates the launch of Stranger Things 4 ahead of its premiere. See pics - India Today
articles.description: Gateway of India was among the 15 monuments across the world that had larger than life projection to celebrate the launch of Stranger Things Volume 1. The series premiere on May 27.
